Rabbinic Judaism is the major religion of the Ashkenazi and Sephardic Jews in Europe.
The Grand Sanhedrin is the reformation of Rabbinic Judaism where the courts are more important than the kohens from the Tribe of Levi. This has caused a schism between them and Temple Judaism.
This is a branch of Judaism that Beta-Israel follows.
Temple Judaism rejects the Sanhedrin and follows the Torah only. This has created a schism between Temple Judaism and the Rabbis of Rabbinic Judaism and the Grand Sanhedrin.

Reforming of Karaite into Temple Judaism.
